task.title: Setting Up the Ports
task.shortdesc: Describes the process for providing access to the ports for the Expansion Interface

context.note: The term "port" as used in this manual refers to the openings into which the Cable connectors are inserted to provide an interconnection between the and the modules.

taskbody.prereq: Install expansion interface DC power supply first.

step.cmd: To gain access to the future expansion PCB Housing, remove the Expansion Door from the top left side of the module.
The ports, with the exception of the port, are also covered by removable Doors. To remove these Doors, press on the right side of the Door and it will pivot slightly.
Grasp the left side of the Door and pull out (see the following figure for locations).
